Dx Ball is a 3D action puzzle game where you have to guide a ball through a series of challenging environments.

You are tasked with collecting all the items that are spread around each level by carefully controlling the ball. The game comes packed with 32 levels, each with lots of obstacles and traps that will send you flying through space in an instant.

Will you manage to collect all the items and complete all levels? Give it a try and find out.

Get ready for an arcade action masterpiece with stay-up-all-night gameplay and an insane level of visual polish.

Suitable for players of any age, Dx Ball transports you to a futuristic 'astrolab' arena suspended high in the clouds. Compete against each other by navigating your marbles through moving platforms and dangerous hazards, while collecting rare gems and power-up enhancements, in an effort to complete each course in record time. Compete head to head in ultra blast multiplayer mode!
